scenario_text.value: I bet I can get a good view from this tree.

I need to at least figure out what’s stomping
around.

What the hell is that thing?! Is that what
was making all that racket?

Its right arm is like a tower of pure muscle.
One hit from that thing and I’d be done for.

I mean, I knew there were some weird
creatures lurking around, but damn...

Anyway, now that I know something dangerous
is nearby, time to get back to Miu.
